trans-unit.source: Specifies how client-side JavaScript is generated to initiate a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 指定用戶端 JavaScript 產生啟始回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The PostBackOptions class allows controls to emit client-side script that initiates a postback event.
trans-unit.target: PostBackOptions 類別可讓發出啟始回傳事件的用戶端指令碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The PostBackOptions class also provides a reference to the control that initiated the postback event through the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: PostBackOptions 類別也會提供啟始回傳事件透過控制項的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The postback event is created based on the options specified in the PostBackOptions object passed in to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 根據傳遞至 PostBackOptions 物件中指定的選項建立回傳事件<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a postback to the server is initiated by elements such as a Submit button or an Image button.
trans-unit.target: 通常，項目，例如送出按鈕或影像按鈕起始回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: However, by emitting client-side JavaScript, different controls can initiate a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，所發出的用戶端 JavaScript 中，不同的控制項可以起始回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> class with the specified target control data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>與指定的目標控制項資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>接收回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> class with the specified target control and argument data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>類別指定的目標控制項和引數資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>接收回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter passed during the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的參數傳遞期間回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> class with the specified values for the instance's properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>類別執行個體之屬性的指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>接收回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter passed during the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的參數傳遞期間回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The target of the postback.
trans-unit.target: 回傳的目標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically post the form back to the server in response to a user action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>自動回傳至伺服器表單張貼回應使用者動作。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref> prefix is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref>前置詞是必要項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the target control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果回傳事件應會傳回目前頁面捲動位置，並將焦點傳回至目標控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the postback event can be raised by client script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果回傳事件就會引發用戶端指令碼。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果發生回傳事件; 之前，是否需要用戶端驗證否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項群組<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。

trans-unit.source: targetControl is .
trans-unit.target: targetControlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Web Forms 網頁回傳的目標 URL。

trans-unit.source: The ActionUrl property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> class specifies the URL for the `action` attribute of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: ActionUrl 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>類別指定的 URL `action` Web Form 網頁的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: The ActionUrl property can be used to specify which Web Forms page to post data back to, causing a cross-page post.
trans-unit.target: ActionUrl 屬性可用來指定 Web Form 頁面的回傳資料給，導致跨網頁回傳。

trans-unit.source: For more information on cross-page posting, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關跨網頁公佈的詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 回傳 Web Form 網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選擇性引數傳送的回傳事件中。

trans-unit.source: The Argument property specifies an optional argument that is transferred in a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 引數屬性會指定選擇性引數傳送的回傳事件中。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to represent the `EVENTARGUMENT` parameter of the _`doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來代表`EVENTARGUMENT`參數 _`doPostBack`的用戶端 JavaScript 方法。

trans-unit.source: The optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 傳送回傳事件中的選擇性引數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the form will automatically post back to the server in response to a user action.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出表單是否會自動回傳至伺服器，以回應使用者動作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the AutoPostBack property to indicate that a Web Forms page should automatically post back to the server in response to a user action such as selecting an item from a drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 AutoPostBack 屬性，表示頁面應該自動回傳至伺服器，以回應使用者動作，從下拉式清單中選取項目，例如 Web Form。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript `setTimeout` method is used with the _`doPostBack` method to ensure that the user action completes before the postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript`setTimeout`方法搭配 _`doPostBack`方法，以確保使用者動作完成之前就會發生回傳。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form will automatically post back in response to a user action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果表單會自動張貼在回應使用者的動作;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should occur from client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出從用戶端指令碼是否應該發生回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The ClientSubmit property indicates whether the postback event should occur from client-side script.
trans-unit.target: ClientSubmit 屬性會指出從用戶端指令碼是否應該發生回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: If you set the ClientSubmit property to `false`, then no JavaScript is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 ClientSubmit 屬性設定為`false`，則會不產生任何 JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: You might assign `false` to the ClientSubmit property if you want to call the `__doPostBack` method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派`false`ClientSubmit 屬性，如果您想要呼叫`__doPostBack`方法自己。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the postback event should occur from client-side script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果發生回傳事件應該從用戶端指令碼。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出用戶端驗證是否需要先發生回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The PerformValidation property is used to specify whether client-side validation is required before the postback event can occur.
trans-unit.target: PerformValidation 屬性用來指定發生回傳事件之前，是否需要用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the PerformValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which validation is required before the postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當 PerformValidation 屬性的值設定為`true`，您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性，以指定的驗證需要的回傳事件發生之前的驗證群組名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果發生回傳事件; 之前，是否需要用戶端驗證否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref> prefix is generated for the client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref>用戶端指令碼會產生前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The `javascript:` prefix is needed with some HTML attributes such as the `href` attribute of the `<a>` tag to distinguish a JavaScript property from a URL.
trans-unit.target: `javascript:`例如前置詞需要具有一些 HTML 屬性`href`屬性`<a>`可以區別 URL 中的 JavaScript 屬性的標記。

trans-unit.source: An attribute like `onclick` does not need the `javascript:` prefix because it is automatically associated with JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 屬性類似`onclick`不需要`javascript:`前置詞，因為它會自動關聯於 JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref> prefix is generated for the client-side script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_javascript:" name="javascript:" href=""></xref>前置詞會產生用戶端指令碼，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control target that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 取得目標控制項接收回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The TargetControl property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object that represents the control that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: TargetControl 屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件，代表接收回傳事件的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: This property is passed as the `EVENTTARGET` parameter to the `__doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被當做`EVENTTARGET`參數`__doPostBack`的用戶端 JavaScript 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that represents the control that receives the postback event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>表示接收回傳事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the current control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示回傳事件是否應該將網頁傳回給目前的捲動位置，並將焦點回復到目前的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The TrackFocus property indicates whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A> control after the postback event has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會指出回傳事件是否應該傳回至目前的頁面 TrackFocus 捲動位置，並將焦點回復到<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A>控制項之後發生回傳事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.TargetControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the target control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果回傳事件應會傳回目前頁面捲動位置，並將焦點傳回至目標控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項群組的<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>回傳至伺服器時，物件會導致驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the validation group to validate when a postback event is generated.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ValidationGroup 屬性來指定驗證回傳事件產生時的驗證群組。

trans-unit.source: Only the validation controls in the specified validation group are validated.
trans-unit.target: 只有指定的驗證群組中的驗證控制項進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項群組<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>回傳至伺服器時，物件會導致驗證。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。
